snippet.textDisplay:
The piece you're talking about is "The Ecstacy of Gold" from The God, The Bad and The Ugly.

It was composed by Morricone.

To my knowledge, the rest of the OST is original.
snippet.textOriginal:
The piece you're talking about is "The Ecstacy of Gold" from The God, The Bad and The Ugly.

It was composed by Morricone.

To my knowledge, the rest of the OST is original.
